name: a new place: chapter of surrender
description: ‘a new place: chapter of surrender’ is the introductory chapter of the blockchain film series ‘a new place’ this initial instalment focuses on relinquishing control and letting the work take you on the journey into the unknown. centred in the spiritual and mystical, ‘a new place’ looks at the relationship with the unknown through meditative and experimental film practices. an exploration of spirituality both for the creator and reader of the text, ‘a new place: chapter of surrender’ aims to raise questions before giving hints later in the series.
